name: Moderator
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION

Freddy is a streamer who's just started but many people are already against him. You  as his moderator must help him grow and create a beautiful community along with him.  

JAM THEME INTERPRETATION

We ourselves are starting as streamers and even though we haven't had toxic people we know they exist and that they can even make a streamer quit. That's why we thought about moderators and how their actions that might go unnoticed actually help a streamer a lot.

Of course, a moderator on their own can't make a streamer get viewers. It's also the streamer's job to attract people.  And if the streamer quits, the moderator will lose their job. Both of them need to work together  to achieve what they want.

For that reason, we thought that making a game based on this almost unseen collaboration would totally fit the theme and be entertaining as well.

NOTE: We saw that the deadline  was changed to 8 PM but just in case we left the 6 PM version.
